Tom Adams joined Rosetta Stone in 2003 and has grown the company into one of the worldâ€™s leading language-learning solution providers.

He was named Ernst & Young Entrepreneur Of The YearÂ® 2008 Award Winner in Greater Washington. A native of Sweden, Tom grew up in France and England.

He holds a B.A. in history from Bristol University, England, and an MBA from INSEAD. Prior to joining Rosetta Stone, Tom was a commodity merchant, managing partnerships across the world. He speaks Swedish, English and French fluently and has a working knowledge of Spanish. His Chinese is basic, and he is currently learning Russian.
